mapper.sql: id, resumeid, jobid, jobname, studentid, studentnumber, firststate, firstlook, secondinvite, secondstate, finalstate
mapper.select: select * from resumejob t1 left join job t2 on t1.jobid = t2.id where t2.enterpriseid = #{enterpriseId}
select * from resumejob t1 left join job t2 on t1.jobid = t2.id where t2.enterpriseid = #{enterpriseId} and t2.jobname like concat('%',#{jobname},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into resumejob (id, resumeid, jobid, jobname, studentid, studentnumber, firststate, firstlook, secondinvite, secondstate, finalstate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resumeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firststate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstlook,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondinvite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finalstate,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update resumejob
resumeid = #{resumeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobid = #{jobid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jobname = #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

secondstate = #{secondstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
